info.title: Terraform-Boot API
info.description: RESTful Services to interact with Terraform-Boot runtime

tags.name: TerraformFromScripts
tags.description: APIs for running Terraform commands on the scripts sent via request body.

tags.name: Admin
tags.description: Admin services for managing the application.

tags.name: TerraformFromDirectory
tags.description: APIs for running Terraform commands inside a provided directory.

tags.name: TerraformFromGitRepo
tags.description: APIs for running Terraform commands using Terraform scripts from a GIT Repo.

tags.name: RetrieveTerraformResult
tags.description: APIs for manage the task form terraform-boot.

post.description: Get Terraform Plan as JSON string from the list of script files provided

Get Terraform Plan as JSON string from the given directory.

parameters.name: module_directory
parameters.description: directory name where the Terraform module files exist.

post.description: Modify resources via Terraform from the given directory.

parameters.description: directory name where the Terraform module files exist.

get.description: Method to retrieve stored terraform result in case terraform-boot receives a failure while sending the terraform result via callback.

parameters.description: directory name where the Terraform module files exist.

parameters.name: terraform_version
parameters.description: version of Terraform to execute the module files.

delete.description: Destroy the resources from the given directory.

parameters.description: directory name where the Terraform module files exist.

delete.description: async destroy resources via Terraform from the given directory.

parameters.description: directory name where the Terraform module files exist.

enum: Result Already Returned or RequestId Invalid

success.description: Describes if the request is successful

terraformVersion.description: The required version of the terraform which will execute the scripts.

isPlanOnly.description: Flag to control if the deployment must only generate the terraform or it must also apply the changes.

additionalProperties.description: Key-value pairs of variables that must be used to execute the Terraform request.

variables.description: Key-value pairs of variables that must be used to execute the Terraform request.

additionalProperties.description: Key-value pairs of variables that must be injected as environment variables to terraform process.
